title: Space Jam
post: Watching MJ and the Looney Tunes was a great way to relive my childhood. GO TOONSQUAD!

title: Avengers: Endgame
post: I literally could not contain myself when watching this movie.  The entire movie theater errupted once the entire cast was together. I also balled like a baby at the end. RIP Tony. You were a real one.

title: Willys Wonderland?
post: This film definitely gave me Five Nights at Freddies vibe but topped with Nicholas Cage awesomeness. Watching Nick Cage as a silent protag going to town on robots is defintely a must watch for a good time... but I wounldn't watch it again tbh.

title: Morbious
post: WOW! The fact that this film was released on April Fools day really says it all.  I had very low expectations going in and even that was TOO HIGH! oh well, at least we got 'Morbin time' out of it.

title: Battleship
post: I dont know who's bright idea it was to make a movie based off a childrens board game where 90% of the time your reponse is 'miss.' I guess the action was cool to see but definitely not enough make up for the poor performance. I wouldn't even watch this during my long boring flight.
